entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 7 April 2023
